statements: SELECT * FROM PatientTreatmentPlan;
SELECT treatment_plan, patient_id FROM PatientTreatmentPlan WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan FROM PatientTreatmentPlan WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%initial%';
SELECT JSONB_VALUE(historical_data, '$.medications') AS medications FROM PatientTreatmentPlan;
SELECT * FROM PatientTreatmentPlan ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientTreatmentPlan WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT treatment_plan FROM PatientTreatmentPlan WHERE patient_id = 456 AND treatment_plan LIKE '%plan%';
SELECT * FROM PatientTreatmentPlan WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_plans FROM PatientTreatmentPlan GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM PatientTreatmentPlan ORDER BY patient_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_data WHERE blood_pressure > 120;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM patient_data GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY data_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, data_time FROM patient_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY data_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate, MAX(blood_pressure) AS max_blood_pressure FROM patient_data WHERE blood_pressure < 90;

SELECT patient_data.patient_id, treatment_description, start_date, end_date FROM treatment_plans JOIN patient_data ON treatment_plans.patient_id = patient_data.patient_id WHERE treatment_description LIKE '%medication%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(plan_id) AS number_of_plans FROM treatment_plans GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(plan_id) > 1 ORDER BY number_of_plans DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plan WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, sensor_id, temperature FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM patient_data GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM historical_data;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT treatment_description, start_date, end_date FROM treatment_plan WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate), MAX(temperature) FROM historical_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM patient_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(heart_rate), AVG(temperature) FROM historical_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY AVG(heart_rate) DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM patient_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, temperature, timestamp FROM patient_data WHERE temperature > 100;
SELECT treatment_id, plan_description, scheduled_date FROM treatment_plan WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, model FROM device_info;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, device_id, temperature FROM patient_data WHERE temperature < 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, plan_description FROM treatment_plan WHERE scheduled_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY scheduled_date;

SELECT d.device_name, p.temperature, h.diagnosis FROM device_info d JOIN patient_data p ON d.device_id = p.device_id JOIN patient_history h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id WHERE h.record_date = '2021-11-15';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(DISTINCT treatment_id) AS num_treatments FROM treatment_plan GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_treatments > 1 ORDER BY num_treatments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patient WHERE height > 160;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE value BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM IoTDevice WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT diagnosis, date FROM DiagnosisRecord ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM IoTDevice WHERE date_activated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_name LIMIT 5
SELECT sensor_type, value FROM SensorData WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT plan_details, start_date, end_date FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY end_date LIMIT 5
